name: Macromedia Design Note
summary: Learn about .MNO files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: MNO files have the same filename as the file they describe, with the .mno extension attached. For example, the file home.html may have an associated Design Note named home.html.mno.
Design Notes may include information such as the file author, status, file type, document name, and a description of the file. They may also contain other user-defined data.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
